DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of Cyclosporine 0.005% and 0.010% eye drops administered twice daily before and following LASIK surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Cyclosporine in Post-LASIK Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient is scheduled for bilateral LASIK surgery Patient is in good general health Eye glasses prescription of 1 to 8 Significant Dry Eye Presence of eye disease Uncontrolled systemic disease Previous use of RESTASISÂ®
